page.title: 11Employment
page.content: In Leintwardine there are three factories which make large machinery and conveyor belts out of long sheets of steel. The three factories employ fifteen people. There are two garages in Leintwardine which employ twenty people either full or part time.There are two road haulage firms, Jukes and Archers, employing thirteen men.In Downton on the Lennox Estate there are eighteen workers. There is a water/ sewage works where two men work. A survey of the fathers of the schoolchildren showed 23 different occupations. As might be expected in this area Farming proved to be the commonest with 10 (27%) fathers employed in farming. Some of them owned their farm,some were farm managers and some were farm labourers. Other significant returns were builders (8%)lorry drivers (8%).
